languages.text: "Защитник Золотого Трона и всего Человечества, храбрейший член Имперской Гвардии Бапаск Иерониус, эксперт по ближнему бою. Погиб, попав в засаду".
"Defender of the Golden Throne and of all Humanity, brave member of the Imperial Guard Bapask Yeronis, melee combat expert. Cause of death: killed in an ambush."
languages.original_text: "Защитник Золотого Трона и всего Человечества, храбрейший член Имперской Гвардии Бапаск Иерониус, эксперт по ближнему бою. Погиб, попав в засаду".

traits.locale_text: {n}The sting-like tool in the skull's mouth whirrs to life. A tape covered in writing falls into your hands. It reads,{/n} "Defender of the Golden Throne and all of Humanity, brave member of the Imperial Guard Bapask Yeronis, melee combat expert. Cause of death: killed in an ambush."

{n}The sting-like tool in the skull's mouth whirrs to life. A tape covered in writing falls into your hands. It reads,{/n} "Defender of the Golden Throne and all of Humanity, brave member of the Imperial Guard Bapask Yeronis, melee combat expert. Cause of death: killed in an ambush."

{n}The sting-like tool in the skull's mouth whirrs to life. A moment later, a tape covered in writing falls into your hands. It reads,{/n} "Defender of the Golden Throne and of all Humanity, brave member of the Imperial Guard Bapask Yeronis, melee combat expert. Cause of death: killed in an ambush."

It reads,{/n} "Defender of the Golden Throne and of all Humanity, brave member of the Imperial Guard Bapask Yeronis, melee combat expert. Cause of death: killed in an ambush."
"Defender of the Golden Throne and of all Humanity, brave member of the Imperial Guard Bapask Yeronis, melee combat expert. Cause of death: killed in an ambush."
"Defender of the Golden Throne and of all Humanity, brave member of the Imperial Guard Bapask Yeronis, melee combat expert. Cause of death: killed in an ambush."
"Defender of the Golden Throne and of all Humanity, brave member of the Imperial Guard Bapask Yeronis, melee combat expert. Cause of death: killed in an ambush."

languages.text: 「黄金の玉座と全人類の守護者、帝国防衛軍の勇敢なる隊員バパスク・イェロニス、近接戦闘のエキスパート。死因：奇襲により死亡」
languages.original_text: "Defender of the Golden Throne and of all Humanity, brave member of the Imperial Guard Bapask Yeronis, melee combat expert. Cause of death: killed in an ambush."

traits.locale_text: {n}スカルの口の中にある針のような道具が、ウィーンという音を立てて動き出した。しばらくすると、文字が書かれたテープがあなたの手に落ちてきた。そこにはこう書かれていた。{/n}「黄金の玉座と全人類の守護者、帝国防衛軍の勇敢なる隊員バパスク・イェロニス、近接戦闘のエキスパート。死因：奇襲により死亡」

languages.text: "Verteidiger des Goldenen Throns und der gesamten Menschheit, tapferes Mitglied der Imperialen Armee Bapask Yeronis, Nahkampfexperte. Todesursache: bei einem Hinterhalt getötet."
languages.original_text: "Defender of the Golden Throne and of all Humanity, brave member of the Imperial Guard Bapask Yeronis, melee combat expert. Cause of death: killed in an ambush."

traits.locale_text: {n}Das stachelähnliche Werkzeug im Mund des Schädels erwacht surrend zum Leben. Einen Augenblick später fällt ein mit Schriftzeichen bedecktes Band in deine Hände. Darauf steht:{/n} "Verteidiger des Goldenen Throns und der gesamten Menschheit, tapferes Mitglied der Imperialen Armee Bapask Yeronis, Nahkampfexperte. Todesursache: bei einem Hinterhalt getötet."

languages.text: « Bapask Yeronis, défenseur du Trône d'Or et de l'Humanité, courageux membre de la Garde Impériale et expert en combat rapproché. Cause du décès : assassiné lors d'une embuscade. »
languages.original_text: "Defender of the Golden Throne and of all Humanity, brave member of the Imperial Guard Bapask Yeronis, melee combat expert. Cause of death: killed in an ambush."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'outil pointu qui trône dans la bouche du crâne se met à vrombir. Un instant plus tard, une bande de parchemin couverte d'inscriptions tombe dans votre main. Vous y lisez :{/n}« Bapask Yeronis, défenseur du Trône d'Or et de l'Humanité, courageux membre de la Garde Impériale et expert en combat rapproché. Cause du décès : assassiné lors d'une embuscade. »

languages.text: «Defensor del Trono Dorado y de toda la Humanidad, valeroso miembro de la Guardia Imperial Bapask Yeronis, especialista en combate cuerpo a cuerpo. Causa de la muerte: caído en una emboscada».
languages.original_text: "Defender of the Golden Throne and of all Humanity, brave member of the Imperial Guard Bapask Yeronis, melee combat expert. Cause of death: killed in an ambush."

traits.locale_text: {n}El punzón que hay dentro de la boca del cráneo cobra vida con un zumbido. Instantes después cae en tus manos una tira de papel con algo escrito. Dice así:{/n} «Defensor del Trono Dorado y de toda la Humanidad, valeroso miembro de la Guardia Imperial Bapask Yeronis, especialista en combate cuerpo a cuerpo. Causa de la muerte: caído en una emboscada».

languages.text: “黄金王座与人类的捍卫者，勇敢的帝国卫队士兵巴帕斯克·耶洛尼斯，近战格斗专家。死因：遭到伏击丧生。”
languages.original_text: "Defender of the Golden Throne and of all Humanity, brave member of the Imperial Guard Bapask Yeronis, melee combat expert. Cause of death: killed in an ambush."

traits.locale_text: {n}伺服头骨中尖刺般的羽毛笔嗡嗡作响。过了一会儿，一张写满了字的纸带落在了你手中，上面是这么写的。{/n}“黄金王座与人类的捍卫者，勇敢的帝国卫队士兵巴帕斯克·耶洛尼斯，近战格斗专家。死因：遭到伏击丧生。”

languages.text: "Altın Taht'ın ve tüm İnsanlığın Koruyucusu, İmparatorluk Muhafızları'ndan yakın dövüş ustası Bapask Yeronis. Ölüm sebebi: Pusuya kurban gitme."
languages.original_text: "Defender of the Golden Throne and of all Humanity, brave member of the Imperial Guard Bapask Yeronis, melee combat expert. Cause of death: killed in an ambush."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kafatasının ağzından iğne benzeri bir alet çıkıveriyor. Bir süre sonra üstünde yazılar olan şerit avucuna düşüyor. Üzerinde şunlar yazıyor:{/n} "Altın Taht'ın ve tüm İnsalığın Muhafızı, İmparatorluk Muhafızları'ndan Bapask Yeronis, yakın dövüş ustası. Ölüm sebebi: pusuya kurban gitti."
